'CODE AUTOGENERATED WITH:  M.C. Menu Voodoo

' Handles to the popup menus to display
Dim hPopupMenu1 As Long
Dim hPopupMenu2 As Long
Dim hPopupMenu3 As Long
Dim hPopupMenu4 As Long
Dim hPopupMenu5 As Long
Dim hPopupMenu6 As Long
Dim hPopupMenu7 As Long
Dim hPopupMenu8 As Long
Dim hPopupMenu9 As Long
Dim hPopupMenu10 As Long
Dim hPopupMenu11 As Long
Dim mii1 As MENUITEMINFO ' Structure that will describe menu items
Dim curpos As POINT_TYPE  ' holds the current mouse coordinates
Dim menusel As Long       ' ID of what the user selected in the popup menu
Dim retval As Long        ' generic return value

'Create the popup menus which are initialy empty.

hPopupMenu1 = CreatePopupMenu()
hPopupMenu2 = CreatePopupMenu()
hPopupMenu3 = CreatePopupMenu()
hPopupMenu4 = CreatePopupMenu()
hPopupMenu5 = CreatePopupMenu()
hPopupMenu6 = CreatePopupMenu()
hPopupMenu7 = CreatePopupMenu()
hPopupMenu8 = CreatePopupMenu()
hPopupMenu9 = CreatePopupMenu()
hPopupMenu10 = CreatePopupMenu()
hPopupMenu11 = CreatePopupMenu()

'Create the structure which is the base for all menus:
With mii1
.cbSize = Len(mii1)' The size of this structure.
.fMask = MIIM_STATE Or MIIM_ID Or MIIM_TYPE Or MIIM_SUBMENU' Which elements of the structure to use.
End With

'get items into created menus & describe their properties

With mii1'(Bold)
.fType =MFT_STRING
.fState =MFS_ENABLED Or MFS_DEFAULT Or IIf( APICheck12345678901,  MFS_CHECKED,  MFS_UNCHECKED)
.wID =1047
.dwTypeData ="Bold"
.cch = Len("Bold")
.hSubMenu = 0
End With
retval = InsertMenuItem(hPopupMenu11,0,1, mii1)

.hSubMenu = 0

'The following code is for adding pictures into menus, if there are any!
'------------------------------------------------------------
'------------------------------------------------------------

'LET'S FINALY SHOW THE MENU
retval = GetCursorPos(curpos)
menusel = TrackPopupMenu(hPopupMenu11,TPM_TOPALIGN Or TPM_NONOTIFY Or TPM_RETURNCMD Or TPM_RIGHTALIGN Or TPM_RIGHTBUTTON,curpos.x, curpos.y, 0, Form1.hWnd, 0 )
retval = DestroyMenu(hPopupMenu11)

'------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
'DOWN BELOW  PUT IN YOUR CODE MANUALY !!!!
'------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Select Case menusel
Case 1047'(Bold)
'Do change appropriate variable value now
APICheck12345678901 = IIf( APICheck12345678901,  False,  True)
'Here is the place to put the code to be executed clicking:  Bold.
Stop
'And for your convinience.....
If APICheck12345678901 = True Then'in case item become unchecked .....
Else 'in case item become checked .....
End If
Case 1046'(Normal)
'Do change appropriate variable value now
APICheck12345678902 = IIf( APICheck12345678902,  False,  True)
'Here is the place to put the code to be executed clicking:  Normal.
Stop
'And for your convinience.....
If APICheck12345678902 = True Then'in case item become unchecked .....
Else 'in case item become checked .....
End If

'Here is the place to put the code to be executed clicking:  Make them ALL/Normal.

Stop
Case 1000'(Make Them ALL/On Start Checked/On Start Unchecked/With Pictures)
'Here is the place to put the code to be executed clicking:  Make Them ALL/On Start Checked/On Start Unchecked/With Pictures.
Stop
Case 1018'(Picture ?/Yes)
'Do change appropriate variable value now
APICheck123456789016 = IIf( APICheck123456789016,  False,  True)
'Here is the place to put the code to be executed clicking:  Picture ?/Yes.
Stop
'And for your convinience.....
If APICheck123456789016 = True Then'in case item become unchecked .....
Else 'in case item become checked .....
End If
Case 1017'(Picture ?/No)
'Do change appropriate variable value now
APICheck123456789017 = IIf( APICheck123456789017,  False,  True)
'Here is the place to put the code to be executed clicking:  Picture ?/No.
Stop
'And for your convinience.....
If APICheck123456789017 = True Then'in case item become unchecked .....
Else 'in case item become checked .....
End If
Case 1016'(Picture ?/Yes for all)
'Here is the place to put the code to be executed clicking:  Picture ?/Yes for all.
Stop
Case 1015'(Picture ?/No for all)
'Here is the place to put the code to be executed clicking:  Picture ?/No for all.
Stop
Case 1014'(Insert Column Break/With dividing line)
'Do change appropriate variable value now
APICheck123456789019 = IIf( APICheck123456789019,  False,  True)
'Here is the place to put the code to be executed clicking:  Insert Column Break/With dividing line.
Stop
'And for your convinience.....
If APICheck123456789019 = True Then'in case item become unchecked .....
Else 'in case item become checked .....
End If
Case 1013'(Insert Column Break/Without dividing line)
'Do change appropriate variable value now
APICheck123456789020 = IIf( APICheck123456789020,  False,  True)
'Here is the place to put the code to be executed clicking:  Insert Column Break/Without dividing line.
Stop
'And for your convinience.....
If APICheck123456789020 = True Then'in case item become unchecked .....
Else 'in case item become checked .....
End If
Case 1012'(Insert Column Break/Delete col. break)
'Here is the place to put the code to be executed clicking:  Insert Column Break/Delete col. break.
Stop
Case 1031'(Close menu)
'Here is the place to put the code to be executed clicking:  Close menu.
Stop
Case 1030'(Help)
'Here is the place to put the code to be executed clicking:  Help.
Stop
Case Else
End Select
